Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides a tax credit for spay or neuter services
Summary: Provides a tax credit for spay or neuter services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a tax credit for the cost of spay or neuter services
